snippet.title: Danganronpa Croxx: The Beginning of the Despair Plan  | FULL PROLOGUE (Eng Sub)
snippet.description:
💛Download Link: https://ash-translations.itch.io/danganronpa-croxx-the-beginning-of-the-despair-plan-hd
Hello everybody! Today I'd like to announce the release of DRCROXX's prologue opening to the public, coming up soon at December 25th after the end of this Video's premiere.

😎Keidy's page (Developer) : https://keidy.tistory.com/

💜The Team working for this translation can be found in this discord server:
https://discord.gg/TDH8fTPbXd 
This shall be the Official page for all the current announcements/Updates for Danganronpa Croxx, there's also a VA included for the English voice in this project on the main character so if you wish to know him, they'll be there from time to time.

Currently only the prologue is available in English✔, Chapter 1 daily life and deadly life are under development❗. If you wish to ask any questions about this fangan be sure to check the discord server or leave your comments and the mods will help you out or I will when I get a small chance to check for comments.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
💥OH YEAH ALMOST FORGOT, SMALL CHANNEL MENTION:
Today I would like you guys to check out this girl's channel full of affection, she has multiple let's plays of YTTD (Your Turn To Die) and starting Danganronpa as well, so please give it a look and spread the news about this channel, she really deserves some subscribers 💖:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnrPuHxvr-bM8CLgEuvyCOw
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lastly is that the process will be slow and steady. There's no ETA for the next chapter, so All we can do is expect that there will be chapter 1 coming during 2022 hopefully, but we never know how the future will play with us🤷‍♂️.
Thank you for watching and have a nice Christmas!💝
#DANGANRONPA #DRCROXX #FANGAME
